page.title: 12Invermoriston:Customs.
page.content: Remembrance Day. Glenmoriston's War Memorial is sited at the crossroads,the focal point of the community.It commemorates 20 men of Glenmoriston who died in two World Wars.Each Remembrance Sunday there is a gathering of local people at the memorial for a short service at 11a.m. A poppy wreath is laid by an ex- serviceman and the company then proceeds to the Church of Scotland for the remainder of the Remembrance Day service. There is also a Glenmoriston Memorial Prize awarded annually in the local schoolto the pupil who displays throughout the year "those qualities which best represent the highest purposes and aims of the nation's war sacrifices."
